Material used.Description: The experiments were conducted using HEK293 cells expressing wild-type or mutant PARK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein levels were significantly reduced in cells expressing c.255del (p.G85fs) compared to wild-type.
Protein levels were significantly reduced in cells expressing c.389del (p.L130fs) compared to wild-type.
Protein levels were significantly reduced in cells expressing c.853del (p.S285fs) compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: Immunoprecipitation was performed using HEK293 cells expressing PARK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: c.255del (p.G85fs) failed to co-immunoprecipitate with DJ-1, unlike wild-type PARK2.
c.389del (p.L130fs) failed to co-immunoprecipitate with DJ-1, unlike wild-type PARK2.
c.853del (p.S285fs) failed to co-immunoprecipitate with DJ-1, unlike wild-type PARK2.

Biological replicates.Description: Two biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Western blot signal intensity was quantified and compared using Student's t-test.

Material used.Description: Cell viability was assessed in HEK293 cells expressing PARK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing c.255del (p.G85fs) showed 40% reduced viability compared to wild-type.
Cells expressing c.389del (p.L130fs) showed 35% reduced viability compared to wild-type.
Cells expressing c.853del (p.S285fs) showed 30% reduced viability compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Cell viability was quantified using MTT assay and analyzed with Student's t-test.
